name: Blind Crawler
description:
Blind Crawler is an audio-only minigame that uses stereo sound.

Collect as many musical notes as possible without being catched.

Each time you collect a note, a new one is spawned and an enemy appears.

Enemies move randomly on the map. When they come close, you can hear their footsteps.

Credits

Sounds: https://freesound.org/

Icons: https://game-icons.net/
